docs.snippet: The owner of the Cleveland Browns, Jimmy Haslam, said the team had told Johnny Manziel to start acting “like a backup quarterback.”...
docs.lead_paragraph: The owner of the Cleveland Browns, Jimmy Haslam, said the team had told Johnny Manziel to start acting “like a backup quarterback.”
docs.abstract: Jimmy Haslam, owner of Cleveland Browns, says the team has told Johnny Manziel to start acting 'like a backup quarterback,' reiterating that Brian Hoyer is the starter; other football news noted.

docs.snippet: A small study of college football players found that the areas of their brains that control memory were smaller than average, especially if they had suffered concussions. But more research is needed to determine if the differences mean they're hea...
docs.lead_paragraph: A small study of college football players found that the areas of their brains that control memory were smaller than average, especially if they had suffered concussions. But more research is needed to determine if the differences mean they're headed for problems down the road.

headline.main: Brain Differences Found in NCAA Football Players
headline.print_headline: Brain Differences Found in NCAA Football Players

docs.snippet: South Korean Park Ji-sung announced his retirement from soccer on Wednesday, bringing the curtain down on a career that took him to the 2002 World Cup semi-finals and saw him become the first Asian to play in a UEFA Champions League final....
docs.lead_paragraph: South Korean Park Ji-sung announced his retirement from soccer on Wednesday, bringing the curtain down on a career that took him to the 2002 World Cup semi-finals and saw him become the first Asian to play in a UEFA Champions League final.
